mapper.sql: ID,POLICY_ID, PRODUCT_ID, INSURANCE_ID, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PAY_ORDER_NO, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, UNDERWRITIND_TIME, PAY_TIME, VALIDATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, END_TIME, APPLICANT_ID, INSURED_ID, APPLY_NUM, TOTAL_PREM, TOTAL_REVENUE, PREM, REPAY_AMOUNT, SEND_CODE, POLICY_CODE, COMMENTS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, POLICY_URL, UPDATE_DATE, RELATION
mapper.update: update T_POLICY_MASTER SET ISVALID='0' where POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_POLICY_MASTER (POLICY_ID, PRODUCT_ID, INSURANCE_ID, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PAY_ORDER_NO, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, UNDERWRITIND_TIME, PAY_TIME, VALIDATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, END_TIME, APPLICANT_ID, INSURED_ID, APPLY_NUM, TOTAL_PREM, TOTAL_REVENUE, PREM, REPAY_AMOUNT, SEND_CODE, POLICY_CODE, COMMENTS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, POLICY_URL, UPDATE_DATE, RELATION) values (#{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuranceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{underwritindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuredId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', NOW(), #{policyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select from T_POLICY_MASTER where POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
